languages.text: "Я не готов дать тебе обещание, что Лорд-инквизитор более не изъявит желания побеседовать с Вольным Торговцем фон Валанциус с глазу на глаз в удобное ему время. Если это произойдет — встреча состоится. Полагаю, в таком случае у нас будет еще одна неприятная беседа — я буду к ней готов". {n}Лицо Хейнрикса не выражает ничего, кроме ледяного спокойствия.{/n}

"I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я не готов дать тебе обещание, что Лорд-инквизитор более не изъявит желания побеседовать с Вольным Торговцем фон Валанциус с глазу на глаз в удобное ему время. Если это произойдет — встреча состоится. Полагаю, в таком случае у нас будет еще одна неприятная беседа — я буду к ней готов". {n}Лицо Хейнрикса не выражает ничего, кроме ледяного спокойствия.{/n}

I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No puedo garantizar que el Lord Inquisidor no pretenda verse cara a cara con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius tan pronto como le sea posible. De ser así, le garantizo que la reunión tendrá lugar. Y supongo que, llegado el caso, nosotros dos también tendremos una desagradable conversación. Estaré preparado». {n}La expresión de Heinrix es fría como el hielo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No puedo garantizar que el Lord Inquisidor no pretenda verse cara a cara con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente von Valancius tan pronto como le sea posible. De ser así, le garantizo que la reunión tendrá lugar. Y supongo que, llegado el caso, nosotros dos también tendremos una desagradable conversación. Estaré preparado». {n}La expresión de Heinrix es fría como el hielo.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・インクィジターが再び、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスとの直接の面会を希望されないとは保証できない。もしそのようなことが起きれば、再び面会しなければならない。その場合、我々はまた不愉快な会話をする必要があるだろう。心の準備だけはしておく」{n}ハインリックスの顔には氷のような冷静さしかない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・インクィジターが再び、自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスとの直接の面会を希望されないとは保証できない。もしそのようなことが起きれば、再び面会しなければならない。その場合、我々はまた不愉快な会話をする必要があるだろう。心の準備だけはしておく」{n}ハインリックスの顔には氷のような冷静さしかない。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “至于大审判官会不会抽个他觉得合适的时间，再次与冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人面对面会谈，这一点我无法保证。如果他真的打算这么做，会谈就一定会举行，到时候我们两个之间恐怕就又要进行一场不愉快的谈话了。不过，到时候我会做好准备。”{n}海因里希脸上没有展露出任何情绪，只有冰冷的平静。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “至于审判长会不会抽个他觉得合适的时间，再次与冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人面对面会谈，这一点我无法保证。如果他真的打算这么做，会谈就一定会举行，到时候我们两个之间恐怕就又要进行一场不愉快的谈话了。不过，到时候我会做好准备。”{n}海因里希脸上没有展露出任何情绪，只有冰冷的平静。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas vous garantir que le seigneur inquisiteur ne manifestera plus jamais son désir de s'entretenir en tête-à-tête avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius. S'il le souhaite, cette rencontre aura lieu, que vous le vouliez ou non. J'imagine que nous aurons alors une autre conversation déplaisante et je veillerai à m'y préparer. » {n}Le visage d'Heinrix n'affiche rien d'autre qu'un calme glacial.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas vous garantir que le seigneur inquisiteur ne manifestera plus jamais son désir de s'entretenir en tête-à-tête avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius. S'il le souhaite, cette rencontre aura lieu, que vous le vouliez ou non. J'imagine que nous aurons alors une autre conversation déplaisante et je veillerai à m'y préparer. » {n}Le visage d'Heinrix n'affiche rien d'autre qu'un calme glacial.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass der Großinquisitor nie wieder den Wunsch äußert, sich von Angesicht zu Angesicht mit {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius zu treffen. Wenn das geschieht, wird das Treffen stattfinden. Und ich gehe davon aus, dass die zwei dann ein weiteres unangenehmes Gespräch führen werden. Ich werde darauf vorbereitet sein." {n}Heinrix' Gesicht zeigt nichts als eisige Ruhe.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nicht garantieren, dass der Großinquisitor nie wieder den Wunsch äußert, sich von Angesicht zu Angesicht mit {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} von Valancius zu treffen. Wenn das geschieht, wird das Treffen stattfinden. Und ich gehe davon aus, dass die zwei dann ein weiteres unangenehmes Gespräch führen werden. Ich werde darauf vorbereitet sein." {n}Heinrix' Gesicht zeigt nichts als eisige Ruhe.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

languages.text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun Hür Tacir von Valancius'la bir daha asla yüz yüze görüşmek istemeyeceğini garanti edemem. İsterse şayet, o görüşme gerçekleşecektir. Sanıyorum o zaman tatsız bir sohbet daha yaşayacağız. Ben de hazır olacağım." {n}Heinrix'in çehresi alabildiğine sakin.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I cannot guarantee that the Lord Inquisitor will never again announce his desire for a face-to-face meeting with Rogue Trader von Valancius at his convenience. If that happens, the meeting will take place. And I presume the two of us will have another unpleasant conversation, in that case. I will be ready for it." {n}Heinrix's face shows nothing but icy calm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lord Engizisyoncu'nun Hür Tacir von Valancius'la bir daha asla yüz yüze görüşmek istemeyeceğini garanti edemem. İsterse şayet, o görüşme olacaktır. Sanıyorum o zaman bir tatsız sohbetimiz daha olacak. Ben de hazır olacağım." {n}Heinrix'in çehresi alabildiğine sakin.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
